New_Bedford.WFHN: WFHN (107.1 FM), better known as Fun 107, is a Contemporary Hit Radio radio station that serves the New Bedford-Fall River, Massachusetts market, broadcasting on the FM band at 107.1 MHz. The station is licensed in Fairhaven, Massachusetts to Townsquare Media. The studio is located in Fairhaven, Massachusetts, shared with WBSM. The transmitter is located New Bedford, Massachusetts on Pope's Island on a tower shared with W243BG. The station was originally built by Broadcast Engineer Randy Place in 1988-1989.
